name: ДСМ на github.io
body:
## Projects ### [dsmblog](dsmblog/). ### Static blog made by [pelican](http://blog.getpelican.com/) generator. Base language is Russian. _[code on github](https://github.com/dmisem/dsmblog)_ ## About me!
My name is Dmitry Semenov.
On graduating at the mechanic-mathematical faculty of Taras Shevchenko University of Kyiv I work in mathematical and computer modeling and analyzing, software development.
I participate in projects of different complexity developing and lecture at the faculty of information systems and technologies of KNEU after Vadim Getman.
[me on github](https://github.com/dmisem)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
